questions.question_text: Which three features can automatically create a Case? (Choose three.)

choices.C: Customize the URL assigned to the content delivery.
choices.B: Use password protection for content deliveries that contain proprietary information.
choices.A: Associate the content delivery with a Salesforce record.

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar is using the content delivery feature of Salesforce Content.
What are two benefits of this feature? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.content_delivery_create.htm&type=5

1. Associate the content delivery with Salesforce record
2. Password Protect content delivery that contain sensitive data
https://developer.salesforce.com/forums/?id=9062I000000ILSUQA4
Some notes says option C is also correct

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers sells their products to wholesale partners and retail outlets. Each process has its own set of unique sales stages.
Which three features can an administrator customize for each opportunity stage? (Choose three.)

discussion.content: Correct Answer: B D E
B D E - Admin can edit Type, Probability, and Forecast Category

Selected Answer: BDE
Anwser should be B,D,E

Setup > Object Manager > Opportunity > fields and relationshsips > stage > Opportunity Stages Picklist Values. 
Here you can see all stages of the opportunity and Add(New stage), reorder or edit existing stages. The only fields you can edit for a stage are Type, Forecast Category and Probability.
Correct Answer is B D E

comments.content: The topics listed are not what an admin can create/edit, just what's listed under Stage in the Opportunity Stages Picklist Values. The only thing an admin can control are: Stage Name (During creation only), Probability, Type, Forecast Category, and Chart Color.

discussion.content: Opportunity Stages Picklist Values: Action, Stage Name, API Name, Type, Probability, Forecast Category, Chart Colors, Modified By

ANSWER: 
B,D,E
B D E is the correct answer

Correct answer is D
For the Reference: https://help.salesforce.com/articleView?id=campaign_influence_parent.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: B
This is right of the Salesforce admin console:
Campaign Influence allows marketers to measure and report on multiple campaigns that have influenced a single opportunity. Influential campaigns can be associated to opportunities manually or automatically.

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.campaign_influence_parent.htm&type=5
https://resources.docs.salesforce.com/latest/latest/en-us/sfdc/pdf/campaign_influence_implementation_guide.pdf

Selected Answer: D
Correct answer is D.

It is B. Campaign Influence allows marketers to measure and report on multiple campaigns that have influenced a single opportunity. Influential campaigns can be associated to opportunities manually or automatically.
it's B

comments.content: Campaign Influence 1.0 isnâ€™t supported in Lightning Experience. To track influential campaigns in Lightning Experience, switch to Customizable Campaign Influence.
Actually, correct that. Answer is D. Modern exams will only consider Customizable Campaign Influence as that is a Lightning feature.

discussion.content: Answer is B. D only applies to Customizable Campaign Influence - not Campaign Influence.
I agree, it is B
No, it is B
Correct Answer : D

questions.question_text: What does campaign influence allow a user to do?

choices.B: Report on the campaigns that have contributed to an opportunity.
choices.D: Adjust the percentage of influence each campaign has on an opportunity.
choices.C: Summarize campaign member statistics on a campaign.
